languages.text: "Смертные издавна ищут способ спастись от собственных порождений. Еще один глупец считает, что его сил хватит на обуздание древнего кошмара — пускай его надежды рассыпятся прахом". {n}Голоса в голове смолкают на секунду.{/n} "Будущее колеблется и меняется, а его прояснения принесут неровные штрихи в узор. Следуй означенному пути — все откроется в свое время".

"Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."
languages.original_text: "Смертные издавна ищут способ спастись от собственных порождений. Еще один глупец считает, что его сил хватит на обуздание древнего кошмара — пускай его надежды рассыпятся прахом". {n}Голоса в голове смолкают на секунду.{/n} "Будущее колеблется и меняется, а его прояснения принесут неровные штрихи в узор. Следуй означенному пути — все откроется в свое время".

traits.locale_text: "Mortals have always been seeking a way to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks their power is enough to tame the ancient horror — may their hopes turn into dust." {n}Voices in your head fall quiet for a second.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes, its clarifications will add uneven strokes to the pattern. Follow the destined path, everything will be revealed in its time."

"Mortals have always been seeking a way to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks their power is enough to tame the ancient horror — may their hopes turn into dust." {n}Voices in your head fall quiet for a second.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes, its clarifications will add uneven strokes to the pattern. Follow the destined path, everything will be revealed in its time."

"Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Follow the destined path, all will be revealed in time."

"Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

languages.text: “凡人总是试图从自己的造物中拯救自己。又出现了一个愚蠢的家伙，误以为他的力量强大到足以驯服远古的恐怖之物，愿他的希望灰飞烟灭。”{n}你脑海中的声音瞬间安静下来。{/n}“未来起伏多变，对它的解读只会玷污图案。沿着注定的道路前进，一切都将在时间中揭晓。”
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

traits.locale_text: “凡人总是试图从自己的造物中拯救自己。又出现了一个愚蠢的家伙，误以为他的力量强大到足以驯服远古的恐怖之物，愿他的希望灰飞烟灭。”{n}你脑海中的声音瞬间安静下来。{/n}“未来起伏多变，对它的解读只会玷污图案。沿着注定的道路前进，一切都将在时间中揭晓。”

languages.text: « Les mortels s'efforcent toujours d'échapper à leurs propres créations. Un autre être imbécile est convaincu d'être assez puissant pour dompter une horreur antique. Que ses espoirs soient réduits en poussière. » {n}Les voix qui résonnent dans votre tête se taisent un instant.{/n} « L'avenir fluctue et change, toute tentative d'interprétation a pour effet de ternir son motif. Suivez la voie qui vous est destinée, tout vous sera révélé au moment opportun. »
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

traits.locale_text: « Les mortels s'efforcent toujours d'échapper à leurs propres créations. Un autre être imbécile est convaincu d'être assez puissant pour dompter une horreur antique. Que ses espoirs soient réduits en poussière. » {n}Les voix qui résonnent dans votre tête se taisent un instant.{/n} « L'avenir fluctue et change, toute tentative d'interprétation a pour effet de ternir son motif. Suivez la voie qui vous est destinée, tout vous sera révélé au moment opportun. »

languages.text: 「人間たちはいつも自分たちの創造物から自身を救おうとしている。いままたひとり、古の恐怖を飼いならせるほどに強力だとうぬぼれる愚か者が現れる。その希望が灰燼と化すだろう」{n}頭の中の声が少しの間静かになる。{/n}「未来は揺らぎ変化する。その解釈は紋様を汚すだけ。定められた道に従え。全てはやがて明らかになる」
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

traits.locale_text: 「人間たちはいつも自分たちの創造物から自身を救おうとしている。いままたひとり、古の恐怖を飼いならせるほどに強力だとうぬぼれる愚か者が現れる。その希望が灰燼と化すだろう」{n}頭の中の声が少しの間静かになる。{/n}「未来は揺らぎ変化する。その解釈は紋様を汚すだけ。定められた道に従え。全てはやがて明らかになる」

languages.text: «Los mortales siempre intentan salvarse de sus creaciones. Otro imbécil se cree capaz de domar un horror antiguo. Que sus esperanzas se conviertan en polvo». {n}Las voces de tu cabeza cesan por un momento.{/n} «El futuro fluctúa y cambia, e interpretarlo solo mancilla la pauta. Sigue el camino predestinado y todo se revelará a su tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

traits.locale_text: «Los mortales siempre intentan salvarse de sus creaciones. Otro imbécil se cree capaz de domar un horror antiguo. Que sus esperanzas se conviertan en polvo». {n}Las voces de tu cabeza cesan por un momento.{/n} «El futuro fluctúa y cambia, e interpretarlo solo mancilla la pauta. Sigue el camino predestinado y todo se revelará a su tiempo».

languages.text: "Sterbliche versuchen immer, sich vor ihren eigenen Schöpfungen zu retten. Und wieder hält ein Dummkopf sich für mächtig genug, einen uralten Schrecken zu zähmen. Möge seine Hoffnung zu Staub zerfallen." {n}Die Stimmen in deinem Kopf verstummen für einen Moment.{/n} "Die Zukunft fluktuiert und verändert sich. Sie auszulegen, kann das Muster nur trüben. Folgt dem vorbestimmten Pfad, dann wird zur rechten Zeit alles offenbart werden."
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."

traits.locale_text: "Sterbliche versuchen immer, sich vor ihren eigenen Schöpfungen zu retten. Und wieder hält ein Dummkopf sich für mächtig genug, einen uralten Schrecken zu zähmen. Möge seine Hoffnung zu Staub zerfallen." {n}Die Stimmen in deinem Kopf verstummen für einen Moment.{/n} "Die Zukunft fluktuiert und verändert sich. Sie auszulegen, kann das Muster nur trüben. Folgt dem vorbestimmten Pfad, dann wird zur rechten Zeit alles offenbart werden."

"Sterbliche versuchen immer, sich vor ihren eigenen Schöpfungen zu retten. Und wieder hält ein Dummkopf sich für mächtig genug, das uralte Grauen zu zähmen — möge seine Hoffnung zu Staub zerfallen." {n}Die Stimmen in deinem Kopf verstummen eine Sekunde lang.{/n} "Die Zukunft fluktuiert und verändert sich. Sie auszulegen, kann das Muster nur verzerren. Folgt dem vorbestimmten Pfad, dann wird zur rechten Zeit alles offenbart werden."

languages.text: "Ölümlüler daima kendilerini kendi yaratılarından korumaya çalışır. Sonra ahmağın biri çıkar, kadim bir dehşeti ehlîleştirebilecek kadar güçlü olduğunu sanır. Umutları solsun." {n}Kafandaki sesler, bir anlığına susuyor.{/n} "Gelecek sürekli değişir. Yorumlanması, örgeye zarar vermekten başka bir işe yaramaz. Kaderindeki yolu izlersen her şey zamanı gelince ortaya çıkacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Mortals are always trying to save themselves from their own creations. Yet another fool thinks himself powerful enough to tame an ancient horror. Let his hopes turn to dust." {n}The voices in your head die down for a moment.{/n} "The future fluctuates and changes. Its interpretation will only tarnish the pattern. Follow the destined path, and all will be revealed in time."
